data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kashani, Ghasem M. (2015): First record and redescription of the terrestrial isopod Hemilepistoidesmesserianus Borutzky, 1945 (Isopoda, Oniscidea) from Iran. ZooKeys 515: 51-57, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.515.9179, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.515.9179
